data.message: You have billions of dollars but you can't even provide a phone number for people who buy adds from you and have problems with your billing system,  learn from Google,  we can go into our account,  we get a phone number and a code to call,  this way they know legitimate customers calling therm,  you get billions of dollars from us but you can't even answer a question I sent you,  you're trying to charge my account and I don't even know why.
